- Decent game for its time.
- Entertaining and tactical shooter.
- Requires somewhat good aim skill to get anywhere (probably why I didn't get anywhere).

Cons:
- Auto-snipers
- Cheating problem
Best game for a good competitive experience.

No hay necesidad de explicar que es CSGO.
Игра отличная, но только после обновления упал FPS.
Fun game to play especially with friends, but can be annoying sometimes. My final score 11/10 IGN

Counter-Strike: Global Offensive is a solid game, a cut-and-dry shooter. Essentially the standard of FPS globally. I've played it for 400+ hours and plan to play more, it has diverse realistic game modes and an even more diverse community. The only thing wrong with it in my opinion is the recent change in this games development. They seem to be catering more towards battle royale style gameplay and would rather cater to what everyone thinks is "hot" at the moment. I would like t o see a return to the classic barebones cs:go experience, not an example of mob rule taking over a very quality first person shooter.   8/10 stars imo

Das Spiel kann beides. Spass machen und extrem frustrieren. Unbedingt high priority spielen (Authentifizierter Account benutzen), sonst hast du in jedem dritten Spiel nen Cheater in der Lobby. Am besten mit Freunden geniessen, die nicht alles gleich so ernst nehmen.
